body.p: The IFRIC considered which entity’s (or entities’) functional currency may be used as a reference point for the hedged risk in a net investment hedge. Does the risk arise from the functional currency of:

li.p: the immediate parent entity that holds directly the foreign operation;
the ultimate parent entity that is preparing its financial statements; or
the immediate, an intermediate or the ultimate parent entity, depending on what risk that entity decides to hedge, as designated at the inception of the hedge?
